_sText:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


IF I HAVE NOT CREDITED YOU FOR A TEXTURE YOU MADE PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT BELOW OR SEND ME A MESSAGE. I FORGET WHERE I GOT MOST OF MY TEXTURES.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I wanted to make this map like "mg_pauls_minecraft_course_v2" because its a challenge for everyone and really hard. I also wanted to make this map different by adding a "fun ending", but I'll explain that later. :P

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are 3 levels in this map. Level Red, Blue, Green. Each level is harder than the last one.

**LEVEL RED**
1. Jumping Stones 
2. Strafe (Falling down; easy)
3. Speed Walking (idk what to call it, lol)
4. Anti-Gravity Beams
5. 180 Jump
6. Anti-Gravity Beams
7. Anti-Gravity Beams

**LEVEL BLUE**
1. Slider Race
2. Jump Timing
3. 180 Jump Push
4. Bounce Jumping/Strafing
5. Moving Block
6. Longjump (Easy)

**LEVEL GREEN**
1. Strafe (Foward; hard)
2. Longjump (Hard)
3. Strafe (Up; hardish)
4. Anti-Gravity Beams
5. Anti-Gravity Beams
6. Hole Jump

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are confused about any of the obstacle just watch the video above. This map took me about 2 weeks to make so I hope you guys enjoy it. By the way, there are 3 secret nades in spawn that gives you cool stuff! :D

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**END**
Once you beat all three levels, you will be in a room saying "Congrats!" with 3 buttons below the sigh. Every time you beat the map you get to choose one button. Each button will tell you a huge hint on finding a secret button within the map (1 secret button for each level). After you press one of the buttons, it will lock the other buttons and kill you after a few seconds. If you have found all the 3 secret buttons, the doors at the end of the map will open. Both doors go to a room with one button in it. That button will do the most AMAZING and WONDERFUL thing EVER!!! lol.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**PICTURES**
1. Spawn
2. Level 1
3. Level 2
4. Level 2
5. Level 3
6. End

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**FIXES FOR V5**
You only lose 5 damage if u fail;  spawn will never close; new song at the end of map;  when someone beats the map they can kill everyone to end the round; added more spawn points.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I want this to be the last version for this map. I will only make a v5 if it is absolutly necessary.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you wanna test this map, go to Undefined Gaming Minigames server. 
8.2.122.124:27015
